data.description: Converts a date into German text
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
As the real "spoken" representation of dates very often differs
    from the one of normal numbers it makes sense to convert them to
    text, to enable applications like speech synthesizers to read them
    correctly. I wrote this module after it was asked for in German
    newsgroups a few times. Maybe other languages will follow.
